name: upsnap
tagline: A Wake on LAN and device control dashboard
description: UpSnap is a self-hosted Wake-on-LAN and device control dashboard. It discovers devices, lets you wake or ping them, and provides quick access to service URLs in a tidy web UI.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Wake sleeping devices remotely using Wake-on-LAN magic packets from the web interface

features.title: Device Discovery
features.description: Automatically discover devices on your network with network scanning

features.title: Status Monitoring
features.description: Check device online status with ping and port checks in real-time

features.title: Service Links
features.description: Store and access quick links to device web interfaces and services

features.title: Device Grouping
features.description: Organize devices into groups for better management of large networks

features.title: Custom Commands
features.description: Execute custom commands on devices for advanced control and automation

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Manage all devices through a clean, responsive web interface

features.title: Mobile
features.description: Control devices from mobile devices with touch-optimized interface
